overview: Climb aboard the bus and take a trip to Camp Kidsongs. Hike along with the Kidsongs Kids and see the animals along a mountain trail, go fishing on a lake with a goofy camp counselor and sing songs around the campfire. You'll laugh as the kids team up for silly sack and wheelbarrow races, and then all join together to put on the best sing-along show ever!
title: Kidsongs: A Day at Camp
